data: MDGNN Xu et al. (2024)
Multi-relational graph integrating industry and institutional relationships
Hierarchical graph embedding with ALIBI positional encoding
IC improvement: 15% (CSI300) Stronger performance on larger datasets
MASTER Li et al. (2024b)
Modeling dynamic stock correlation through alternating attention
Market-guided gating mechanism used for feature selection
Ranking metric: +13% Portfolio metric: +47% (CSI300, CSI800)
DoubleAdapt Zhao et al. (2023)
Dual adaptation for distribution drift in streaming data
Multi-head transformation layer used for feature and label adaptation
Consistent improvement in LSTM, GRU, Transformer implementations Model-agnostic adaptability
DPA-STIFormer Yan and Tan (2024)
Feature-centric temporal model
Dual-path mechanism with self-adaptive gating
Outperforms in CSI500, CSI1000, NASDAQ, NYSE Improved IC and Sharpe Ratio
DANSMP Zhao et al. (2022)
Market knowledge graph at the execution level
Dual attention network used for complex entity interactions
Return: 16.97% Sharpe Ratio: 4.628 (CSI300E)
GINN Xu et al. (2024)
Integration of GARCH theory and neural networks
GARCH-based regularization in the LSTM loss function
Consistent outperformance across 7 global indices Strong zero-shot design performance
DIFFSTOCK Daiya et al. (2024)
Diffusion model used for market prediction
Self-adaptive noise scheduling used for stock volatility
Sharpe Ratio improvement: NYSE: +7.92% NASDAQ: +6.18%
Wang et al. (2024b)
LLM integration used for news processing
Text transformation for numerical prediction
Outperforms in event-driven market shifts Multi-domain applicability
